languages.text: {n}Экраны когитатора вспыхивают, а утробный рев в его глубинах превращается в истошный визг, в котором, кажется, слились предсмертные вопли тысяч людей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Экраны когитатора вспыхивают, а утробный рев в его глубинах превращается в истошный визг, в котором, кажется, слились предсмертные вопли тысяч людей, чьи души питают машину. Еще несколько минут — и Хейнрикс дрожащей рукой вытаскивает из разъема когитатора переносное дата-хранилище, которое немедленно убирает в подсумок.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Экраны когитатора вспыхивают, а утробный рев в его глубинах превращается в истошный визг, в котором, кажется, слились предсмертные вопли тысяч людей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands. Heinrix bends over the keys, presses a button, and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally and you see his lips moving...{/n}

{n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands. Heinrix bends over the keys, presses a button, and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally and you see his lips moving...{/n}

{n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands. Heinrix bends over the keys, presses a button, and flinches as if from an electric shock. His head snaps back unnaturally and you see his lips moving...{/n}
{n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者的屏幕闪烁起来，低沉的轰鸣变成了疯狂的嘶吼，仿佛包含了成千上万的人临死前的哀嚎。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器的屏幕闪烁起来，低沉的轰鸣变成了疯狂的嘶吼，仿佛包含了成千上万的人临死前的哀嚎。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las pantallas del cogitador emiten un destello y el rugido gutural de sus profundidades se convierte en un chillido frenético que parece contener los aullidos de miles de muertes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las pantallas del cogitador emiten un destello y el rugido gutural de sus profundidades se convierte en un chillido frenético que parece contener los aullidos de miles de muertes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機の画面がまたたき、その奥で小さな唸り声が、まるで何千もの死者の叫びを含んだような必死の悲鳴に変わる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機の画面がまたたき、その奥で小さな唸り声が、まるで何千もの死者の叫びを含んだような必死の悲鳴に変わる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Cogitator-Bildschirme flackern, und das kehlige Brüllen in seinen Tiefen wird zu einem irren Kreischen, das die Todesschreie Tausender zu enthalten scheint.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Cogitator-Bildschirme flackern, und das kehlige Brüllen in seinen Tiefen wird zu einem irren Kreischen, das die Todesschreie Tausender zu enthalten scheint.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les écrans du cogitateur se mettent à clignoter, et le grondement guttural provenant du cœur de la machine se change en un hurlement strident qui semble constitué de milliers de cris d'agonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screens flash, and the guttural roar in its depths turns into a frantic shriek that seems to contain the death cries of thousands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın ekranları yanıp sönerken derinlerden gelen boğuk kükremesi de binlerce kişinin ölüm feryadını barındıran bir haykırışa dönüşüyor.{/n}
